infotexts.fabricationdescription.ptoe_rareearth: Scandium, yttrium, or lanthanides except promethium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_beaker: Suitable to most simple chemical reactions.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_distillationdevic: Evaporate and collect liquids. It may take a bit longer time.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_electroplatingtan: Cathode is for the item about to be plated, anode is for the plating metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_beryllium: Similiar with aluminum in most attributes, but lighter and rarer.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_boron: Metalloid with properties complex and unique, usages even more various.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_ammonia: Ammonia is the best source of nitrogen in chemical synthesis.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_sulphur: Smelly yellow solid mainly used to make black powder and sulphuric acid.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_vanadium: Uncommon metal. One of its oxides is a perfect catalyst of sulphuric acid production.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_chromium: Hardest among metals, and not too expensive.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_manganese: Crispy metal. Its compounds have wide usages.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_gallium: Melts in hand. Used to produce thermometers and semiconductor materials, also ID cards.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_arsenic: Looks like metal but crumbly. Poisonous.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_bromine: Extracted from marine water, extremely stinky.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_silver: Valuable metal used to make medals. Its ions can sterilize wounds.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_lanthanum: The first of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_cerium: The second of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_praseodymium: The third of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_neodymium: The fourth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_samarium: The sixth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_europium: The seventh of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_gadolinium: The eighth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_terbium: The ninth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_dysprosium: The tenth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_holmium: The eleventh of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_erbium: The twelfth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_thulium: The thirteenth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_ytterbium: The fourteenth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_lutetium: The fifteenth of lanthanide elements, a kind of rare earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_tungsten: Heavy and hard, with highest melt point among metals.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_platinum: Precious metal, catalyst of ammonia synthesis.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_gold: Its value does not need explanations.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_mercury: Is liquid at room temperature, can dissolve many metals. Toxic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_plutonium: Transferred from uranium. The power it containing greatly exceeded uranium and thorium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_disulphuricacid: React mildly with water to generate sulphuric acid.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_potassiumchlorate: Strong oxidant. Causes a big bang even with sugar.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_potassiumnitrate: One material of black powder. Also a type of fertilizer.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_potassiumpermanga: Strong oxidant. Mainly used to disinfect.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_silveramalgam: Silver-mercury alloy that can be separated by distillation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_aluminiumamalgam1: Mercury with some aluminum dissolved. Reacts violently when coming into contact with water, and can be separated by distillation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_aluminiumamalgam2: Mercury with a lot of aluminum dissolved. Becomes extremely dangerous when coming into contact with water, and can be separated by distillation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_goldamalgam: Gold-mercury alloy that can be separated by distillation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_deuteriumoxide: Similar to water, but a little heavier and thicker. Try to take a sip?
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_fusionfuelk2dt: Put this into a nuclear shell, then you'll get a hydrogen shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_hydrogentank: Dangerous fuel, completely prohibited. Can be refilled by oxygenerators.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_hydrogenstoringal: Rare earth-nickel alloy inside is able to store massive hydrogen safely. Can be refilled by oxygenerators.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_silvercommendatio: A small medal fashioned out of copper and silver, made out of Commendation. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with the experience 3 times of Commendation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_silvermedal: A small medal fashioned out of bronze and silver, made out of Medal. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with the experience 3 times of Medal.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_goldcommendation: A small medal fashioned out of copper and gold, made out of Commendation. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with the experience 10 times of Commendation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_goldmedal: A small medal fashioned out of bronze and gold, made out of Medal. When applied to another crewmember's body, it instantly bestows them with the experience 10 times of Medal.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_v2o5crate: A metal crate with some divanadium pentaoxide powder inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_vanadinitecrystal: Beautiful crystal which takes some time to form.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_blackpowderpack: An explosive with power weaker than UEX.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_physicoriumcannon: Causes massive damage to both walls and giant creatures. Extra lacerations for creatures.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_caststeelcannon: An ancient cannon which requires black powder to fire.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_physicoriummusket: Little material used but strong power.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_revolvermusket: Capacity is 4. The condition bar demonstrates remaining black powder.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_musket: Consumes black powder to shoot projectiles. The accuracy is NOT guaranteed.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_pulselaserammobox: A box of containing some vanadinite crystals. It changes the colour of laser and is more durable.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_shiningsword: Deals five types of resistless damage with its amazing power.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_wrenchplated: A wrench plated with hard metal. The strengthened material allows for little more efficient repairs and super swings.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_screwdriverplated: A screwdriver plated with hard metal. The strengthened material allows for little more efficient repairs and super swings.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_crowbarplated: A crowbar plated with hard metal. Damage armored targets effectively.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_ultimatewrench: A Superb tool and strong weapon that only mechanical masters can rein.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_znmndrycell: Zinc-Manganese Dry Cell. Extremely cheap but NOT rechargeable.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_incandescentlight: Old type light bulb, bright enough but consumes more power.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_halogenlight: Halogen injected. It's now a little better than normal incandescent lights.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_advancedglass: Resistant. Mainly used in production of many instruments.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_nh3bh3tank: A tank storing hydrogen with nitrogen-boron compounds. Small capacity due to immature technology.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_fluorescentpowder: Powder shaved off from ID cards. Contains gallium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_asgacircuit: Gallium arsenide semiconductor applied. Function much stronger than FPGA circuit.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_masterkey: An ID card that looks strange.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_smartheater: Looks like a kind of cooker, but is much too expensive.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_flusk: Used in reactions refer to liquids. Heatable.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_condenser: Transfer gas went through into liquid with cold water.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_thermometer: Made from gallium, with super measuring range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_advancedsprayer: Little consumption, super range and all paints supported.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_brominewaterdilut: Got this by passing chlorine into marine water. It can be concentrated by medical fabricator.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_brominewaterconce: It really stinks. Distill to get liquid bromine.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_nuclearglowstick: Glows for about 5 minutes after a shake, can be used unlimited times.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_aluminium2: Too much aluminium stacking in this container.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_divingknifegilded: It is not sharper but makes you more focused.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_lightweightdiving: You can walk and run as usual in it. You can take a incandescent light with you by it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_lightweightscoote: Carry it on your back instead of holding it.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_advanceddivingmas: Level 2 diving mask: Much harder than a normal one.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_smartdivingmask: Level 3 diving mask: Only comsumes oxygen in necessity.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_automaticdivingma: Level 4 diving mask: Refills oxygen tanks when enquipped and in idle.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_watertank: Can both contain and proof water.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_plutoniumblock: The power of this pack is at least 2 times of a nuclear shell. Think twice before use.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_plutoniumshell: Maybe more destructive than a plutonium block.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_leadcrate: Thick enough to prevent fatal radiations. Also the place to recycle reaction rods.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_endlesspulselaser: Able to generate laser for unlimited times theoretically, but overheat may damage the precision lens inside.
Able to generate tri-laser for unlimited times theoretically, but overheat is very likely to damage the precision lens inside.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_coilgunammoboxsco: Scorch the target quickly, especially destructive to armored targets. Applies a stackable amplify-burn-damage buff to creatures hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_chaingunammoboxsc: Scorch the target gradually into ash, especially destructive to armored targets. Applies a stackable amplify-burn-damage buff to creatures hit.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_endlesspulselaser: An overheat protector will prevent shots when critical temperature is reached.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_silverionglue: Antibiotic Glue made out of silver ion, cheaper but not so effecient as general antibiotic glue.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_merbromin: Disinfect efficiently, causes barely no irritation.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_edta2na: Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid disodium salt, which can relieve all kinds of heavy metal poisioning.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_dimethylmercury: One of the most dangerous mercury compounds. It can even penetrate latex gloves.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_whitearsenic: Fatal poison even slowlier than sufforin.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_arsenicantidote: An antidote for acute cyanide poisoning.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_silverore: A mineral containing large amounts of silver.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_cerargyrite: A mineral composed of silver and chlorine.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_carnotite: A mineral containing potassium, vanadium and uranium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_cavansite: A mineral containing calcium, vanadium and silicon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_argentite: A mineral composed of silver and sulphur.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_realgar: A mineral consisting of arsenic and sulphur.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_orpiment: A mineral composed of arsenic and sulphur.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_sperrylite: A mineral composed of platinum and arsenic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_chromite: A mineral containing iron and chromium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_crocoite: A mineral containing lead and chromium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_nickeline: A mineral composed of nickel and arsenic.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_violarite: A mineral composed of nickel, iron and sulphur.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_monazite: A mineral containing lanthanides and phosphorus.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_ferberite: A mineral containing iron and tungsten.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_scheelite: A mineral containing calcium and tungsten.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_huebnerite: A mineral containing manganese and tungsten.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_borax: A mineral containing sodium and boron.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_priceite: A mineral containing calcium and boron.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_cinnabar: A mineral composed of mercury and sulphur.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_berylite: A mineral containing beryllium, aluminum and silicon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_chrysoberyl: A mineral containing beryllium and aluminum.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_phenakite: A mineral containing beryllium and silicon.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_emptyreactionrod: If this is placed in an active reactor, material inside will absorb neutrons and begin to transfer.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_plutoniumfuelrod: Despite the long life 12 times of uranium fuel rod, it's a waste to fuel your reactor with this.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_plutoniumreaction: It seems not able to react further. Deconstruct to get plutonium.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_tritiumreactionro: It seems not able to react further. Deconstruct to get tritium oxide.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_note181: It seems that someone was not sober while drawing these.
infotexts.entitydescription.ptoe_note183: Put a empty reaction rod into water, then the reactor.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.ptoe_arsenicp: You have died of arsenic poisoning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ptoe_arsenicpoison: The patient is seemingly sick, and without a prompt treatment they will only get worse.
The patient has been poisoned and is vomiting acutely. Unless an antidote is found, the patient will eventually die in agony.
You have a headache and fatigue. The nausea is getting worse over time.
The arsenic content in the patient's body severely exceeded the limit.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.ptoe_mercuryp: You have died of mercury poisoning.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ptoe_mercurypoison: The patient has been poisoned to obnubination. Unless an antidote is found, the patient will eventually die in agony.
The patient has vital signs, but mercury has thoroughly invaded the brain. There is nothing to do.
Dizzy...... who and where am I?
The mercury content in the patient's body severely exceeded the limit.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ptoe_merbrominprot: Merbromin is protecting this guy from further infections.
